ppy/osu-wiki.summary: The osu! wiki has seen significant activity with recent updates to the MWC 7K 2025 team listing and new tournament pages, including the addition of the ANZT6W tournament article. There are also ongoing efforts to document past ANZT tournaments, with plans for a comprehensive pull request to cover all undocumented events. Additionally, contributors are working on translating and reviewing content to ensure the wiki remains up-to-date and accurate.

ppy/osu.summary: The osu! repository has experienced substantial activity, with recent push events and pull requests focused on implementing new features and rebalancing existing ones. Notable updates include the addition of basic difficulty and performance calculation for the Autopilot mod, changes to the osu!taiko rhythm and stamina calculations, and rebalancing of star ratings and performance points. These updates aim to enhance gameplay and provide a more engaging experience for players.

ppy/osu-web.summary: The osu-web repository has seen a recent pull request to replace ts-loader and terser with swc, a significant update aimed at improving the web application's performance and efficiency. This change is part of ongoing efforts to maintain and optimize the osu! web platform, ensuring a seamless user experience and staying up-to-date with the latest technologies.

ppy/SDL3-CS.summary: The SDL3-CS repository has received a pull request to update bindings, incorporating pen support for iOS and Android, as well as removing the SDL_main.GDK.g.cs file. This update is part of the ongoing maintenance and improvement of the SDL3-CS project, which is essential for the development of osu! and other applications that rely on this binding.
